menu_colorpicker_prompt_reset_palettes:
RESET PALETTE SWATCHES
Double-click to reset your palette swatches to their default colors.
menu_colorpicker_prompt_close_accept:
ACCEPT
Click to confirm color choice and exit.
You can also press the "A" key.
menu_colorpicker_prompt_close_cancel:
CANCEL
Click to cancel color choice and exit.
You can also press the "C" key.
menu_colorpicker_prompt_gamut_box:
GAMUT BOX
Click and drag to select a color.
menu_colorpicker_prompt_default: Hover over an object for more information.
menu_colorpicker_prompt_hue_slider:
HUE SLIDER
Click and drag to change hue.
menu_colorpicker_prompt_select_previous:
PREVIOUS COLOR
The previous color choice.
Click to revert your current color to this option.
menu_colorpicker_prompt_select_current:
CURRENT COLOR
Your new color choice.
You can click and drag to save it to the palette swatches.
menu_colorpicker_prompt_hex:
HEX CODE
The hexadecimal color code for your current color.
Double left-click to copy hex color code to clipboard.
Right-click to paste color from clipboard.
menu_colorpicker_prompt_palette:
PALETTE SWATCH
Click to select this palette swatch.
Right-click to save your current color to this palette swatch.
menu_colorpicker_notif_reset_palettes_su:
PALETTE SWATCH
Swatches have been reset to default values!
